titleStmt.title: The moste notable Historie of John Lorde Mandosse Translated from the Spanish by T. de la Peend
titleStmt.author: Bandello, Matteo, 1485-1561. Novelle.
Boaistuau, Pierre, d. 1566. aut
Peend, Thomas.

notesStmt.note: A free translation in verse, with additions, of the sixth tale in "Histoires tragiques", Pierre Boaistuau's version of Matteo Bandello's "Novelle", translated by T. Delapeend.
Title from caption title, leaf B1r.
Imperfect; lacks title page, leaf D8, and all after leaf I8, which is torn. Inlaid.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
